title: English (1851) Portable Folio Family Bible
description:
English (1851) Portable Folio Family Bible: The Portable Folio Family Bible, expertly compiled by Rev. Walter McGilvray, D.D., is a remarkable edition that blends the revered Holy Bible with the insightful commentaries of Scott and Henry. This version stands out for encompassing over four thousand notes, meticulously chosen from the esteemed standard authors of Europe and America. These notes are critical and explanatory in nature, offering a deeper and more nuanced understanding of the biblical texts.

Rev. McGilvray's edition is designed to cater to families seeking a comprehensive and accessible study of the Bible. The integration of Scott and Henry's commentaries with the scriptural texts provides a rich tapestry of theological insights and interpretations. The extensive collection of notes, drawn from a wide range of authoritative sources, ensures that readers are exposed to diverse perspectives and interpretations, enhancing their engagement with the Bible. This edition is an invaluable asset for families and individuals who wish to delve into a profound and enriching exploration of their faith.
